mapper.sql: order_id, sls_id, fls_id, description, cname, cci, consumer_address, cas, consumer_name, state, cause, consumer_account_id, merchant_account_id, Lng, lat, business_charge, business_category, master_name, mci, cost, deal_id, ort, oct, sst, oet, ofst, evaluation, text_evaluation, cancel_flag, commission, poundage, mlng, mlat
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from t_order
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_order (order_id, sls_id, fls_id, description, cname, cci, consumer_address, cas, consumer_name, state, cause, consumer_account_id, merchant_account_id, Lng, lat, business_charge, business_category, master_name, mci, cost, deal_id, ort, oct, sst, oet, ofst, evaluation, text_evaluation, cancel_flag, commission, poundage, mlng, mlat) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{slsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cci,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consumerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consumerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consumerAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{merchantAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{businessCharge,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{businessCategory,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{masterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mci,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dealId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ort,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{oct,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sst,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{oet,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ofst,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{evaluation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{textEvaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cancelFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{commission,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{poundage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mlng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mlat,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update t_order
order_id = #{record.orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sls_id = #{record.slsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fls_id = #{record.flsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cname = #{record.cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cci = #{record.cci,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consumer_address = #{record.consumerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cas = #{record.cas,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consumer_name = #{record.consumerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

cause = #{record.cause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consumer_account_id = #{record.consumerAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
merchant_account_id = #{record.merchantAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Lng = #{record.lng,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lat = #{record.lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
business_charge = #{record.businessCharge,jdbcType=CHAR},
business_category = #{record.businessCategory,jdbcType=CHAR},
master_name = #{record.masterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mci = #{record.mci,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cost = #{record.cost,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deal_id = #{record.dealId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

oct = #{record.oct,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update t_order set order_id = #{record.orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sls_id = #{record.slsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fls_id = #{record.flsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cname = #{record.cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cci = #{record.cci,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consumer_address = #{record.consumerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cas = #{record.cas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consumer_name = #{record.consumerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{record.state,jdbcType=CHAR}, cause = #{record.cause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consumer_account_id = #{record.consumerAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, merchant_account_id = #{record.merchantAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Lng = #{record.lng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lat = #{record.lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, business_charge = #{record.businessCharge,jdbcType=CHAR}, business_category = #{record.businessCategory,jdbcType=CHAR}, master_name = #{record.masterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mci = #{record.mci,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost = #{record.cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deal_id = #{record.dealId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ort = #{record.ort,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, oct = #{record.oct,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sst = #{record.sst,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, oet = #{record.oet,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ofst = #{record.ofst,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, evaluation = #{record.evaluation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, text_evaluation = #{record.textEvaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cancel_flag = #{record.cancelFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, commission = #{record.commission,jdbcType=INTEGER}, poundage = #{record.poundage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mlng = #{record.mlng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, mlat = #{record.mlat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update t_order
sls_id = #{slsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fls_id = #{flsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cci = #{cci,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consumer_address = #{consumerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cas = #{cas,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consumer_name = #{consumerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR},
cause = #{cause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consumer_account_id = #{consumerAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
merchant_account_id = #{merchantAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Lng = #{lng,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
business_charge = #{businessCharge,jdbcType=CHAR},
business_category = #{businessCategory,jdbcType=CHAR},
master_name = #{masterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mci = #{mci,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cost = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deal_id = #{dealId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ort = #{ort,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
oct = #{oct,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sst = #{sst,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
oet = #{oet,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ofst = #{ofst,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
evaluation = #{evaluation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
text_evaluation = #{textEvaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cancel_flag = #{cancelFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},

poundage = #{poundage,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mlng = #{mlng,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mlat = #{mlat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_order set sls_id = #{slsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fls_id = #{flsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cci = #{cci,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consumer_address = #{consumerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cas = #{cas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consumer_name = #{consumerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, cause = #{cause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consumer_account_id = #{consumerAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, merchant_account_id = #{merchantAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Lng = #{lng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, business_charge = #{businessCharge,jdbcType=CHAR}, business_category = #{businessCategory,jdbcType=CHAR}, master_name = #{masterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mci = #{mci,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deal_id = #{dealId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ort = #{ort,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, oct = #{oct,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sst = #{sst,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, oet = #{oet,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ofst = #{ofst,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, evaluation = #{evaluation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, text_evaluation = #{textEvaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cancel_flag = #{cancelFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, commission = #{commission,jdbcType=INTEGER}, poundage = #{poundage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mlng = #{mlng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, mlat = #{mlat,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select td.order_Id, td.state, td.sls_Id, td.cname, td.ort, td.master_Name, td.mci, td.mlat lat, td.mlng lng, td.business_Category, td.business_Charge from t_order td where td.consumer_account_id=#{time.accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and not (state='2' and ort is null) ORDER BY ort DESC

select td.order_Id, td.state, td.sls_Id, td.cname, td.ort, td.master_Name, td.mci, td.lat , td.lng , td.business_Category, td.business_Charge from t_order td where td.merchant_account_id=#{time.accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and not (state='2' and ort is null) ORDER BY ort DESC
select SUM(if(state='5',1,0)) as psoCount,SUM(if(state='7',1,0)) as upoCount from t_order td where td.consumer_account_id=#{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select COUNT(1) as orderCount,IFNULL(sum(evaluation),0) as totolEvaluation from t_order where merchant_account_id=#{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and state='1'

select order_id, sls_id, fls_id, cname, cci, consumer_address, cas, consumer_name, state, consumer_account_id, merchant_account_id, Lng, lat, business_charge, business_category, master_name, mci, cost, deal_id, cancel_flag, commission, poundage, mlng, mlat from t_order where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
